metadata.title: CVE-2022-1253 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository strukturag/libde265 priorto and including 1.0.8. The fix is established in commit8e89fe0e175d2870c39486fdd09250b230ec10b8 but does not yet belong to anofficial release.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1253` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1
libde265-examples - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1').
